title: Animation Playground
description: Experimental project exploring advanced Flutter animations and micro-interactions for enhanced UX.
summary: Experimental project exploring advanced Flutter animations and micro-interactions for enhanced UX.

challenges.solution: Optimized paint calls with cached Paint objects and RepaintBoundary for smooth 60fps animations.
Implemented spring animations and velocity-based gestures for natural-feeling interactions.
Built custom page transitions using Hero animations with morphing effects.
Added reduce-motion support that gracefully degrades animations for users who prefer less motion.

outcome: This playground has become a personal reference library for advanced animations, with several components being reused across production projects to enhance user experience.
